attributes.action: To force the Culture Secretary to Re-think the Olympic Logo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The logo thats been put forward tho represent the London 2012 logo should have been decided by the people of the UK, and not by a group of pen pushing executives wasting public money...£400,000???????....shame on you!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
